channel.title: Fluid Dynamics Math on CulDeVu
channel.description: Recent content in Fluid Dynamics Math on CulDeVu

item.title: Fluid dynamics update
item.description: I’m not really going to talk about much math-y stuff this time. I’ve covered too much ground since my last entry to be able to remember all the pitfalls I ran into. So this time I’m only really going to be talking about the general algorithm, how I deal with the pitfalls of the marker particle method, and the ongoing translation to CUDA. And probably share some of my Mario Maker levels.
